link_desc:
Zabbix template and PowerShell script for monitoring Marvell RAID Controller

The script may generate LLD data for Marvell RAID Controllers, Virtual Drives (other word Logical). Physical Drives not processed because not suitable info provided from MSU. Also it can takes some components health status.

Does not have Linux-machine with that RAID Controller - if somebody rewrite to .sh - make pull-requests

Dependencies

It's using Marvel Storage Utility to connect to controller, so you must install it first : https://support.hpe.com/hpsc/swd/public/detail?swItemId=MTX_17d87af242a144cbb3a954352c&swEnvO

Notice

Tested on 3.4.7 only, should work on older too
features: Low Level Discovery (LLD)|Zabbix Agent|Zabbix Agent Active|Custom Script
author: GOID
